title: Did Amy Connie Barrett's religious group inspire the server story?
subtitle: In Destobian Margaret Atwood, future American society is governed by a fundamentalist Christian government and deprives women of their rights, including their reproductive rights.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Judge Amy Connie Barrett, Supreme Court candidate for President Donald Trump of the United States, is a member of a Christian group that inspired Margaret Atwood's novel "The Story of the Maid."
